actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A joint resolution to extend the Federal riot reinsurance and crime insurance programs.

summary.text: Amends the National Housing Act to extend the termination dates of the Federal riot reinsurance program and the Federal crime insurance program from April 30, 1977 to April 30, 1978.

titles.title: A joint resolution to extend the Federal riot reinsurance and crime insurance programs.
